aircraft.value: Hawk Defender - AC-4943-801 at Forward Operating Base-2

defect_observed.value: Countermeasure dispenser misfire. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fire Control component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 17/05/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 19/05/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 22/05/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 20/05/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 24/05/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer
